Text: The Platinum Collection is a compilation album by David Bowie, released in 2005.

Text: The Platinum Collection (David Bowie album):  The first disc is the same as the compilation "The Best of David Bowie 1969/1974", which was released in 1997, and the second disc is the same as the 1998 compilation "The Best of David Bowie 1974/1979".

<Text: The Platinum Collection (David Bowie album):  This 2007 release was part of EMI's two-disc Sight & Sound series of releases and features a DVD of 1980s videos on the second disc.>
